alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:21AM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Light accumulations with localized areas of 1 to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Southern Platte and Goshen Counties into eastern Laramie County including Chugwater, La Grange, Albin, and Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
